name: Just Regular Troika Backgrounds on Cards
name_original: Just Regular Troika Backgrounds on Cards
description:
Made for the Troika Tarot Jam, here are two backgrounds that let you play as...

Relekan - You didn't ask to exist, but you'll suck up and eat whatever stands in your way of doing what you want with your life.

Definetely (NOT) A Cat - You're a cat, like any other. You love Catnip, naps, detaching your tail and sculpting it into useful items, have a rubber body that resists damage, love shirts but cannot wear pants, ya know: (NOT) a cat!
